description: REFINED UNIFIED MODEL: Transport with spherical scattering kernel. Tests the hypothesis that 274 Mpc (geometric fit) = 2 × 137 Mpc (radius). Includes proper ℓ(ℓ+1)/(2π) normalization and spectral tilt. This should match the geometric model's fit quality while revealing transport physics.

parameters.name: r_psi
parameters.description: Domain RADIUS (not diameter). Test if r ~ 137-147 Mpc emerges, confirming 274 Mpc = 2r (diameter).

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Spectral tilt (Blue Interaction). α=0 is pure geometry, α>0 favors high-ℓ (blue), α<0 favors low-ℓ (red).

parameters.name: scale_factor
parameters.description: Scale factor: 1.0 = fit radius directly, 2.0 = fit diameter. Set to 1.0 to test radius hypothesis.

parameters.name: chi_star
parameters.description: Comoving distance to last scattering surface (z=1090)
